title: Add FO-04 KV store entries to seed.ts
description:
Add KV store seed entries for FO-04 discovery agent.

File to modify: src/db/seed.ts

Add entries for:
- versions.fo-04-discovery.system.default - System prompt
- versions.fo-04-discovery.prompt.default - User prompt template
- versions.fo-04-discovery._temperature.default - Temperature setting
- versions.fo-04-discovery._model_name.default - Model name

The user prompt template should accept GatheringContext variables:
- name, familiarity, initialTopic
- exchanges (array of question/answer pairs)
- screenNumber

Follow the Liquid template pattern from FO-03.
acceptance_criteria: npm run db:seed succeeds and includes FO-04 entries
closed_reason: Added FO-04 discovery KV entries with system prompt, user template, temperature, and model
